name: shed-level
description: Represents a BACnet shed level, specifying the amount of load to be reduced as a percent, level, or amount.

options.name: percent
options.description: The percent of load to be shed.

options.name: level
options.description: The discrete level of load to be shed.

options.name: amount
options.description: The absolute amount of load to be shed.
